browse-receipt-order-pkg.sqlwhere: PoHeader.poNumber is not null and PoHeader.poNumber <> 'null' and PoHeader.poNumber <> 'N/A' and PoHeader.status >= '3030' and PoHeader.status < '4010' and PoHeader.status <> '3045' and PoHeader.lastRevision = 'C' and PoHeader.poType <> 'BO' and PoHeader.poType <> 'DO' and PoHeader.poType <> 'SB' and PoHeader.icPoHeader in (SELECT distinct PoHeader.icPoHeader FROM PoHeader as PoHeader, PoLine as PoLine WHERE PoHeader.icPoHeader = PoLine.icPoHeader and PoLine.status >= '3030' and PoLine.status < '4010' and PoLine.status <> '3045' and (PoLine.requisitionerCode = :as_userid or ((PoLine.requisitionerCode is null or PoLine.requisitionerCode = '') and (PoHeader.requisitionerCode = :as_userid or PoHeader.buyerCode = :as_userid))))
